description:
One month after the battle on the floating fortress Soara, Chaika is still searching for the remains of her late father, the taboo emperor, along with Toru, Akari, and Fredrica. The next owner of his remains is another of the eight heroes, Claudia Dodge.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La princesse qui rassemble un corps
The Princess Who Gathers the Remains
